block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across New Jersey this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the New Jersey Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to njcivic@nytimes.com.
State of New Jersey

Newark New Jersey Law Revision Commission. Thursday at 4:30 p.m. Law Revision Commission, 153 Halsey Street. (609) 292-4840. Trenton Pension and Health Benefits Review Commission. Friday at 10 a.m. Division of Pensions and Benefits, 50 West State Street. (609) 292-4840. Trenton Senate Budget and Appropriations hearing. Monday at 10 a.m. and 1:30 p.m. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840. Trenton Assembly Budget Committee hearing. Tuesday at 10 a.m. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840.
Atlantic County
Northfield Board of Chosen Freeholders. Tuesday at 4 p.m. Stillwater Building, 201 South Shore Road. (609) 645-5900.
Bergen County

Paramus Mayor and Council. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Paramus Borough Hall, 1 Jockish Square. (201) 265-2100. Ridgewood Village Council. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Ridgewood Municipal Building, 131 North Maple Avenue. (201) 670-5500, ext. 205.
Cumberland County
Titusville Affordable Housing Committee. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Hopewell Township Municipal Complex, 201 Washington Crossing-Pennington Road. (609) 737-1022.
Essex County

Belleville Rent Leveling Board. Monday at 7 p.m. Belleville Town Hall, 152 Washington Avenue. (973) 450-3310. Montclair Township Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Montclair Municipal Building, 205 Claremont Avenue, first floor. (201) 509-4955. Orange Insurance Fund Commission. Tuesday at 6 p.m. Orange Town Hall, 29 North Day Street. (973) 266-4000.
Hudson County
Jersey City Board of Chosen Freeholders. Thursday at 1 p.m. Hudson County Municipal Building, 567 Pavonia Avenue. (201) 795-6001.
Mercer County

Princeton Town Council. Monday at 7 p.m. Princeton Town Council, 400 Witherspoon Street. (609) 924-5704. Princeton Environmental Commission. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Princeton Town Council, 400 Witherspoon Street. (609) 921-1359.
Monmouth County
Neptune City Council. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Neptune Municipal Complex, 25 Neptune Boulevard. (732) 988-5200.
Morris County

Morris Plains Social Services Board. Thursday at 5 p.m. Morris View III, West Hanover Avenue. (973) 285-6000. Morristown Board of Chosen Freeholders. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Administration and Records Building, Court Street. (973) 285-6015. Morristown Human Relations Commission. Wednesday at 3:45 p.m. Administration and Records Building, Court Street. (973) 285-6000. Morristown Board of Public Transportation. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. 30 Schuyler Place. (973) 829-8101.
Passaic County
Paterson Municipal Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Paterson City Hall, 155 Market Street. (973) 321-1500.
Somerset County
North Plainfield Planning Board. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. North Plainfield Borough Hall, 263 Somerset Street. (908) 769-2915.
Sussex County
Andover Township Committee. Monday at 8 p.m. Green Township Municipal Building, 150 Kennedy Road. (908) 852-9333.
Union County

New Providence Borough Council. Monday at 8 p.m. New Providence Borough Hall, 360 Elkwood Avenue. (908) 665-1400. New Providence Planning Board. Tuesday at 8 p.m. New Providence Borough Hall, 360 Elkwood Avenue. (908) 665-1400. Westfield Grant-writing workshop for Union County historical societies, sponsored by the Board of Chosen Freeholders. Monday at 6:30 p.m. Union County Annex Building, 300 North Avenue East. Registration available at (908) 436-2912.
Warren County

Alpha Municipal Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Alpha Municipal Building, 1001 East Boulevard. (908) 454-0088. Belvidere Library Board. Monday at 11 a.m. Belvidere Public Library, 301 Second Street. (908) 475-3941. Columbia Township Committee. Thursday at 8 p.m. Knowlton Municipal Building, 628 Route 94. (908) 496-4816.
